data.subtitle: Hi!
data.text: I'm Emilia. I'm a junior javascript developer, with great knowledge in frontend and backend. I use mostly React, Redux, Gatsby, Node, Express, Strapi, Sequalize. I look forward to learning more

data.subtitle: Work experiencie
data.text:
- Fullstack Engeneer at Awkbit (Oct 2020 - present) Contract

React, Gatbsy, PHP, Drupal, Docker

- Tutor at Henry (Sep - Nov 2020) Internship

Extra classes on the topics of each class, solving doubts and moral support.

- Teaching Assistant at ISFT 182 (2020)

I offered two workshops on gamification and use of video games for libraries

- Schoolar Librarian (2017 to 2019)

This experience taught me a lot. To manage and work with big groups of people with different ideas. I read tales, poetry and gived workshops in primary and secondary schools
